entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches dissipating this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning and risk of freezing drizzle. Clearing late in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 18 January 2023
